title: Instead of QQ over leblanc go find some tips vs her
body:
I have no problem vs any type of leblanc, yes she is a scary champion but vs people with some brain can figure out how to completly make her useless on the enemie team.

The only time I died to Leblanc was when I played champion that are not made for the matchup such as{{champion:161}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:105}} those are pretty much the only champion she counter hard and ALL ADC.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/8VdxaIta-some-tips-to-fight-against-leblanc

please surf the forum there are plenty of them

replies.body: So why don't you give us some tips then?

Since OP is just here to be condescending, I'll give a tip instead.

LeBlanc's Distortion (W) has a travel time. If you land hard CC on her before she completes the dash, the dash will be interrupted and it won't deal any damage. You can do that with Ahri's Charm (E), Syndra's Scatter the Weak (E), Lissandra's Ring of Frost (W) etc. She can't dodge skillshots mid-dash so just throw it in her direction. I like Syndra and Lissandra better because their ability is not blocked by minions. Distortion's damage can also be avoided easily by blinks such as Katarina's Shunpo (E) and Talon's Cutthroat (E). 

The good thing is that most of these spells have lower cooldown than her Distortion (18/16/14/12/10) until around level 7, when LeBlanc have 4 levels in her W and likely have a Fiendish Codex. So if you play it right you can win the lane early on.

Actually most LeBlancs max Q first because the most basic combo is Q R W and it's basically guaranteed burst. So blinks tend to be super effective until even later in the game than level 7.

At least that's my experience anyway.

Maxing Q is a weak play.  Ranks of Q give you 50 more damage for 10 more mana.  Ranks of W gives you 40 more damage and 2 seconds lower cooldown for 5 more mana.

10 more damage is definitely not worth having fewer Ws.  W is one of the best buttons in the game.
no, most LBS max W first. for wave clear, and stronger/easier harass
